title: Sono Bijin Otoko Fushidara ni Tsuki
description: Nagi, who has always dreamed of a sweet romance, is troubled by her dislike of men. However, she meets a beautiful, androgynous, male model, Aran, who asks her to help him with his modeling work. Nagi's heart is pounding at MAX capacity at his urging and promise that "I'll teach you every thing you need to know"! When she realizes that she doesn't mind being touched by him because of his transcendent beauty, Nagi asks this beautiful and pushy man to give her lessons about love in exchange! Love lessons for a limited time between a beautiful, egoistical male model and a boyish and competitive girl!
author: OSAKA Hal
